body.content:
United Nations Liaison Office West Africa.
HeadQuarter Branch, Lagos-Nigeria.
From the Office Dr. John Fletcher.

Date: 16th / August/ 2021.
Our Ref: WB/IPC/UN/CPSN/2021

*Attention: Mr. Gerard,*

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email with content well noted.

This is to officially inform you that the UNITED NATIONS have agreed to
compensate them with the sum of USD$2,500,000.00. This also includes every
foreign contractor that may have not received their contract payment, and
to those that have had an unfinished transaction or international
businesses that failed due to government problems etc. We found your name
in our list and that is why we are contacting you to let you know that your
payment compensation funds have been approved in your name.

Thank you for your kind understanding.

Best regards.

Dr. John Fletcher
(United Nations Liaison Office West Africa).
E-mail: johnfletcher1145@gmail.com

On Mon, Aug 16, 2021 at 11:37 AM <gerard@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Gerard
>
>

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
